thread.title: In the executive lounge with breakfast
thread.title_full: In the executive lounge with breakfast - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: In the executive lounge with breakfast
text: this time is to stay in Beijing Renaissance hotel, in so many marriott hotel i feel Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel is the most profound impression, every employee has a high quality, concierge service of the handsome boy, beauty of executive lounge attendants also considerate, pearl, in particular, special lovely a little girl, with the breakfast provided me with considerate service, business skilled, high quality, after come to Beijing will choose here.
